name: Magyar Vegyipari Szövetség
goal: The association was established in 1990 with the intention to act jointly to promote the development, protection and enforcement of interests of undertakings performing and carrying out production and related activities in the  Hungarian chemical industry sector.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Chemical industry related legislation, policies, public consultations, projects, events and publications.
